item.title: Predicting who will win a NFL match at half time
item.description: It was great to have a little break, Spring break, although the weather didn’t feel like spring at all! During the early part of the break I worked on my final project for Jeff Leek’s data analysis class, which we call 140.753 here. Continuing my previous posts on the topic, this time I’ll share the results of my final project. At the beginning of the course, we had to submit a project plan (more like a proposal) and in mine I announced my interest to look into some sports data.
